headers.subject: [tosdr:2889] Gittip: [Good] All submissions of any kind are public domain

subject: Gittip: [Good] All submissions of any kind are public domain
text:
Title: [Good] All submissions of any kind are public domain
Topic: ownership
Summary: Anything submitted to Gittip is public domain, but the only submission enabled at present is one's own biography and avatar.
Score: 100

> You acknowledge and agree that any questions, comments, suggestions, ideas, plans, notes, drawings, original or creative materials or other information that you provide to Gittip regarding Gittip, the Site (collectively, "Submissions") are non-confidential and shall be dedicated to the public domain according to the CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication.

Discussion:

I'm not confident in my assessed score here. I think that it's very good that Gittip explicitly states that submissions, which are currently limited to biographical information an an avatar, are covered under the terms, but some users may not like that their information is considered public domain.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
